title: Think I Lost It
lyrics:
Think it's a game?
Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do, do, uh, uh, yeah
Ayy, ayy
Uh, uh, hey
Ayy they gon' think I lost it, yeah, hey, hey
Uh, hey, lost what? Bitch, I ain't lost shit, hey, uh



Ayy they gon' think I lost it, and the top, I lost it

Forgiato offset, and I'm drippin', faucet

Ayy they gon' think I lost it, they gon' think I lost it

And her top, she lost it, so the top, I lost it, yeah



This shit big as a Suburban, she never heard of it

I'm in both lanes just to swerve it, she puttin' that work in

Ayy, I got less than five percs and can't see a person

Ayy, if I had to pay for it girl, you know I'd purchase

Uh, let me purchase, let me, let me purchase

Buy her Fendi purses, buy Chanel and Birkin

Ayy that pack land on Thursday, so much, make you nervous

How you fly a bird in? How you fly a bird in?

Uh, ayy like 2Pac, I'm Birdie, huh

I just made a mil off servin'

I spent a whole mil on some jewelry, huh

I know only the real gon' feel me

And I know the deaf gon' hear

I'ma sleep on the mail this year, huh

Tryna have five M's this year

Have 'em lookin' like M, M, M



Ayy they gon' think I lost it, and the top, I lost it

Forgiato offset, and I'm drippin', faucet

Ayy they gon' think I lost it, they gon' think I lost it

And her top, she lost it, so the top, I lost it, yeah



Okay, look, work it, bitch go'n and work it

I done threw 'bout me a quarter in this bitch on purpose

The way my wrist hurtin', probably broke it

And the bank, I broke it

I can't fuck no broke bitch

I can't stand my old bitch, yeah

Girl, come bend it over for me

Tell me what all you need

I won't tell you it's guaranteed

Now she yellin' out, "Marry me"

But I'm married to the money

Love carats like a bunny

In Paris with a bunny, yeah, look

Everything painted red, I got different bread

Got some white, wheat, honey oat, and Panera bread, yeah

Plus I'm thoroughbred, yeah, and my dogs fed, yeah

Plus my girl know I like that pussy bald head



Ayy they gon' think I lost it (Lost it), and the top, I lost it (Lost it)

Forgiato offset, and I'm drippin', faucet

Ayy they gon' think I lost it, they gon' think I lost it

And her top, she lost it, so the top, I lost it, yeah
